creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text: Shouldn't this method return the subject DN of the clients X509 certificate?

creator: vbogak@ilm.com
text:
Installed and compiled Tomcat 3.2.3 on Linux 7.0 + Apache 1.3.14

Used Ajp13

request.getUserPrincipal() returns null
request.getRemoteUser() returns authenticated usename, 

Both work fine on Tomcat 3.1/Solaris/Apache 1.3.9

vbogak@ilm.com

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text: In Tomcat 3.2.3 and earlier, userPrincipal isn't set.  This is fixed Tomcat 3.3.
Marking it as fixed instead of UNCONFIRMED.
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
